Hero.overviewIntro: MY JOURNEY: FROM FINDING STORIES TO LEARNING TO LISTEN TO BUSINESS. TODAY, I COMBINE EMPATHY WITH ANALYTICS TO CREATE STRATEGIES FOR YOUR GROWTH.
Hero.overviewDetails: I remember my first reports: running through the streets, searching for heroes, hundreds of questions, and one goal: to capture a living story. Over the years, I created video projects for brands and social campaigns, learned to see the essence, to turn the complex into something understandable and valuable for people. Today, I am changing my direction: I combine my experience with projects and attention to detail with analytics and digital tools to help businesses develop their projects more effectively. The world of SEO seems particularly attractive to me: the excitement of discovering what is happening 'on the other side of the screen,' analyzing, looking for patterns, and finding opportunities for growth.

Projects.title: My Projects
Projects.subtitle: Our projects showcase the best visuals and storytelling techniques.

project1.name: JOURNALIST | NEWS 1TV (BBC PARTNERSHIP) | 2024 – 2025
project1.summary: Creation of daily news reports for 1TV in partnership with the BBC.
project1.role: Journalist in the news department of 1TV, working in partnership with the BBC.
description: Daily coverage of events and creation of original reports.
Researching topics, interacting with representatives of state and public organizations, coordinating and conducting interviews.
Creating stories in accordance with British broadcasting standards and journalistic ethics.
project1.result: Release of original stories that form the unique brand of the TV channel's news with publication on 1TV's social networks.

project2.name: PRODUCER | 'VOTE CONSCIOUSLY' CAMPAIGN (NDI) | 1TV 2025
project2.summary: Production of video clips and reports for the 'Vote Consciously' campaign.
project2.role: Producer of 8 artistic video clips for the 'Vote Consciously' campaign and 4 informational reports on pre-election activities and the importance of conscious voting in partnership with ndi.org for 1TV.
description: Searching for characters, negotiating with public and famous personalities of Moldova for participation in the project.
Developing scripts, coordinating ideas with characters and the main director of the channel.
Researching and selecting locations, organizing conditions for filming.
Managing the filming process, coordinating the work of operators and the film crew.
Post-production: editing, music selection, final product control.
project2.result: 8 video teasers for the pre-election campaign in storytelling style and 4 special informational reports within STIRI 1TV, emphasizing the importance of conscious voting.

project3.name: PRODUCER | Website for TATIANA BRAGA BEAUTY SALON | 2024
project3.summary: Creation and launch of a landing page for a new shampoo from Tatiana Braga Beauty Salon.
project3.role: Producer of the project to launch a website for a new product of the Tatiana Braga beauty salon.
description: Research of the shampoo created by an expert.
Creating text for the landing page.
Organizing a photo shoot for the product.
Coordinating work with the programmer when creating the landing page.
project3.result: Successful launch of the landing page, including content creation, organization of a photo shoot and coordination with a web developer, which led to the effective presentation of the new product on the market.

project4.name: PRODUCER | MILINA BAKERY | 2024
project4.summary: Production of three video clips to promote a new line of Milina Bakery breads.
project4.role: Producer for the creation of three videos for the website and promotion of a new line of breads.
description: Searching for characters, negotiating with public figures for participation in the project.
Developing scripts, coordinating ideas with characters and the chief marketer of Milina.
Selection of locations, organization of conditions for filming, storyboarding, directing.
Managing the filming process, coordinating the work of operators and the film crew.
Post-production: editing, music selection, final product control.
project4.result: 3 promotional videos for the company's website.

project5.name: ADMINISTRATOR | WEDDING SALON “APRIORI” | 2023
project5.summary: Full management of a wedding salon, including sales, marketing and staff training.
description: Full management of the company in the absence of the director.
Consulting clients and closing deals.
Maintaining social networks and the website.
Inventory, administration of the cash book.
Staff training.
Work in the conditions of an intense wedding season, work with foreign clients.
project5.result: Ensured the smooth operation of the salon, increased sales and successfully managed the team during the peak season.

project6.name: CO-AUTHOR AND SPEAKER | “PREMIERE ESQUISSE” PROJECT | 2021 – 2022
project6.summary: Co-author and speaker of an educational project for young designers.
description: Co-author and speaker of the “Premiere Esquisse” project for young designers.
Creating the concept of the competition and its detailed implementation.
Conducting lectures and master classes on the topics: 'Producing a photo shoot', 'Main style vectors', 'Brand and collection archetypes', 'Linearity and color contrasts in clothing'.
project6.result: 2 seasons of the project were implemented, the final of which were shows of collections of young designers.

project7.name: PROJECT MANAGER | MAXIMUM ELECTRONICS SRL | 2019 – 2022
project7.summary: Management of a project to create video reviews for a major electronics retailer.
description: Project manager for the creation of video reviews for the Maximum Electronics SRL online store.
Research of premium products (LG, Samsung, Sharp), writing scripts with my own skill, without AI.
Participation in filming as a presenter. Participation in post-production.
Coordination of texts and reviews with foreign representatives of LG Samsung Sharp.
Author of commercial texts for the Point.md portal.
project7.result: More than 50 videos (5–8 min), the Dyson AirWrap review got 300,000+ views.

project8.name: PR-MANAGER | MILINA BAKERY | 2019
project8.summary: Management of a PR campaign to launch new product lines for Milina Bakery.
description: Head of the PR campaign, Milina Bakery / Iugintertrans S.A and other projects.
Launch of new lines of healthy breads 'Pravia' and 'Baltia'.
Scripts, storyboarding, casting, organization of filming and control of editing of commercials.
Joint work with a targetologist and maintenance of video content for social networks.
project8.result: Sales growth from 300 to 6000 loaves per day in the first three months after launch.

project9.name: PRODUCER, AUTHOR AND DIRECTOR | FASHION PROJECT “ISTIL”, ORHEI TV | 2018 – 2019
project9.summary: Full production of a weekly fashion TV show.
description: Producer, author and director of the fashion project “ISTIL”, Orhei TV.
Full production of a weekly 26-minute issue: selection of heroines, presenters, locations, partners, scripts and control of editing.
Management of a team of 5 people (2 presenters, 3 operators).

project10.name: JOURNALIST | “ISTORII URBANE” PROJECT, TNT BRAVO TV | 2013 – 2017
project10.summary: Journalist and co-author of a daily television project about urban stories.
description: Journalist and co-author of the daily project “Istorii Urbane”, TNT Bravo TV.
Daily search for topics, heroes and organization of filming for 4 years in a row.
Writing texts for stories, publication in social networks.
project10.result: Creation of daily content for a television project for four years, including searching for stories, organizing filming and writing scripts.

project11.name: TV PRESENTER AND AUTHOR | NIT TV PROJECT | 2009 – 2013
project11.summary: Presenter, journalist and author of several television projects, including a morning show and a program on consumer rights protection.
project11.role: TV presenter, journalist and author of the project
description: TV presenter of the morning show 'NIT Dejun' - scripts, search for current topics, interviews with show business stars, special reports.
Author and head of the project 'Traps for the consumer' - journalistic investigations in the field of consumer rights protection, interviews with politicians, lawyers and public figures.
Special correspondent of the 'Microeconomics' program - scripts and analytical materials.
project11.result: Creation and maintenance of several successful television programs, including conducting journalistic investigations and interviews with key figures.
